paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR gene and its variants, specifically focusing on the Val30Met (V30M) mutation, its effects, and the potential therapeutic role of santalol isomers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: α- and β-santalol synergize to reduce wild-type (WT) and Val30Met (V30M) mutant TTR aggregates.

functional_data.summary: Santalol isomers were shown to reduce aggregation of both wild-type and V30M mutant TTR.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with familial amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The study emphasizes the role of santalol in stabilizing TTR and preventing its aggregation.
key_quotes: α- and β-santalol act synergistically to reduce the aggregation and toxicity of wild-type and V30M mutant TTR.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper focused on the TTR gene and its variants.
